tool_description: Generates alerts for fulfillment performance anomalies by comparing current metrics against historical baselines and predefined thresholds, enabling proactive issue management.

alert_sensitivity.description: Sensitivity level for anomaly detection: low, medium, high

metric_thresholds.description: Custom threshold values for specific metrics

error_messages: Invalid alert sensitivity: Use one of [low, medium, high]
Invalid threshold values: Threshold values must be positive numbers
Invalid notification channels: Use combinations of [dashboard, email, sms, webhook]
Invalid alert categories: Use combinations of [performance, cost, quality, customer_impact, inventory]
Baseline data insufficient: Need sufficient historical data to establish anomaly detection baselines
usage: Configure alert_sensitivity and alert_categories, optionally set custom metric_thresholds and notification_channels. The tool monitors for anomalies and generates appropriate alerts.

severity_breakdown.description: Breakdown of alerts by severity level
